summary: NAR 04/01/2003. THE CONSUMER HAD TO HAVE HER VEHICLE TOWED TWICE BECAUSE IT WOULD NOT START.   WHEN EVER THE CONSUMER TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER TO BE SERVICE NO PROBLEMS WERE FOUND REGARDING THE VEHICLE NOT STARTING.  ON ONE OCCASION THE DEALER LOCATED A CRACKED BELT.   THE STUD/NUT WAS REPLACED ON THE RIGHT FRONT WHEEL.  *JB
